main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in Portland, Oregon on June 17, 1958.
interesting points: The observation lasted between 5 and 10 minutes., The object was described as being half the size of a full moon., The object was reported to be silver and only one object was observed., A reflection due to sunlight and haze was suggested as a possible explanation for the sighting., The witness was a housewife whose poor eyesight might have contributed to the impression of a round object.
